inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path in which to search for version files (like AssemblyInfo.* files). Leave empty to use the sources directory. NOTE: this is case sensitive for non-Windows systems.

inputs.name: versionSource
inputs.label: Version Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source for the version number. Defaults to the build number, but can be a build variable.

inputs.name: doInstallGitVersion
inputs.label: Install GitVersion Tool if not present or older
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want to install GitVersion.

inputs.name: GitVersionToolInstallation
inputs.label: Install GitVersion Tool
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if you want to install GitVersion as a global tool or a local tool. Details can be found [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/global-tools).

inputs.name: GitVersionAdditionalFeed
inputs.label: Additional NuGet package source for GitVersion Tool
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide an Url to an additional package source for installation

inputs.name: GitVersionCustomNugetConfig
inputs.label: Custom NuGet config for GitVersion Tool
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide an Url to a custom NuGet.config for custom feeds

inputs.name: GitVersionInstallerVersion
inputs.label: Package version for GitVersion Tool
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a package version for installation. Versions can be found on [nuget.org](https://www.nuget.org/packages/GitVersion.Tool) or [GitHub](https://github.com/GitTools/GitVersion/tags)

inputs.name: doUseLatestGitVersionInstallerVersion
inputs.label: Use latest GitVersion Tool version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want to install always the latest stable version of GitVersion Tool.

inputs.name: customNumberVariable
inputs.label: Variable to use
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable to use for the version number. Do not specify $() - just enter the name.

inputs.name: versionFormat
inputs.label: Version Extract Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pattern to use to extract the build number as well as default replacement pattern.

inputs.name: customBuildRegex
inputs.label: Custom Regex Find Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular Expression to extract version from build number. This is also the default replace regex (unless otherwise specified in Advanced settings).

inputs.name: buildRegexIndex
inputs.label: Build Regex Group Index
inputs.helpMarkDown: Index of group in build regular expression that you want to use as the version number. Leave as 0 if you have no groups.

inputs.name: paramAssemblyVersion
inputs.label: Digits used for Assembly Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define how many digits will be used for the assembly version. Unused digits will be set to 0.

inputs.name: paramAssemblyFileVersion
inputs.label: Digits used for Assembly File Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define how many digits will be used for the assembly file version. Unused digits will be set to 0.

inputs.name: paramAssemblyInformationalVersion
inputs.label: Digits used for Assembly Informational Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define how many digits will be used for the assembly informational version. Unused digits will be set to 0.

inputs.name: paramOverwriteFourthDigitWithBuildCounter
inputs.label: Overwrite the fourth digit with a build counter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want to overwrite the fourth digit with a build counter.

inputs.name: paramBuildCounterKey
inputs.label: Build Counter Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define a key on which the build counter is based on. For the same key, each build increments the counter.

inputs.name: paramVersionCode
inputs.label: Version Code Calculation

options.2: SemVer to Int32 (10 bits per digit)

inputs.helpMarkDown: Define the algorithm to calculate a version code (continuously incremented number) based on the version information.

inputs.name: doAssemblyInfoAppendSuffix
inputs.label: Append suffix to Assembly Info Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want to append the suffix to the assembly info version.

inputs.name: doConvertAssemblyInfoToLowerCase
inputs.label: Convert the Assembly Info Version to Lower Case
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want to convert the assembly info version to lower case.

inputs.name: paramAssemblyInfoSuffixType
inputs.label: Suffix Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define how many digits will be used for the assembly informational version. Unused digits will be set to 0.

inputs.name: paramAssemblyInformationalVersionSuffix
inputs.label: Suffix for Assembly Informational Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add a suffix after the version string for the assembly inforamtional version.

inputs.name: buildNumberVersionFormat
inputs.label: Build Number Version Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the version format to be used as build number.

inputs.name: buildNumberAction
inputs.label: Build Number Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose to replace the build number or append the verion information

inputs.name: doReplaceAssemblyInfo
inputs.label: Do replace in AssemblyInfo files.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want to replace the version definition in Assembly Info files.

inputs.name: filePatternAssemblyInfo
inputs.label: File Patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown:
File filter to replace version info.

The file paths are relative to the build source directory. Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns. [More information](https://aka.ms/minimatchexamples)
